item.title: Jessie at Home
item.description:
“Jessie At Home features many free crochet & knit patterns & tutorials, along with some other crafts and occasional stories about being a mom of twins.”
By Jessie Rayot.
🇺🇸 Started in 2008.
Average 53 words.

item.title: Little Cotton Rabbits
item.description:
“knitting like mad and living with autism in the family. Knitting patterns for toys and novelties, some free and some to buy.”
By Julie.

Average 435 words.
